From the fundamentals, to the most advanced features, this training covers everything you need to know about Excel

items.title: Microsoft Word VBA Macro Programming - Introduction
items.headline: The only Word VBA programming course on the web. Why learn Excel VBA, if you plan to automate Microsoft Word?
objectives_summary: By the end of the training, you will have the knowledge required to start confidently writing VBA macros which automate procedures in Word and which will enhance your own profile as a Word user and a Word developer.
You will learn to overcome the limitations of the Macro Recorder by writing your own code.
You will become familiar with the Visual Basic Editor.
